title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Microlearning Design for VR-Based Social Job Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain community problem-solving procedures with 80% accuracy using a 5-minute VR microlearning module
Through smartphone-based VR simulations, learners can practice communication skills required in professional settings at least three times and incorporate feedback.
Based on four weeks of microlearning activities, learners can complete a social sector job project (e.g., community campaign planning) that meets at least 70% of evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
